description: Philip Rosedale is the founder of a burgeoning Web phenomenon, the massive multi-player substitute reality called "Second Life."   When the scheduled speaker for this month, Francis Fukuyama, was suddenly sidelined by a motorcycle injury, Rosedale sprinted from the bench to take his place at the podium.  He'll be improvising; he has a scintillating world to improvise with.
name: Philip Rosedale: 'Second Life:' What Do We Learn If We Digitize EVERYTHING?
